name: Highway Racing Car 3D
description: Just enjoy the racing in extreme situations. The highway gives you the amazing and most satisfying traffic escape experience which you would never learn in any driving school. Highway Racing Car 3D is starting on the endless busy roads and on the highway. You have to be very careful. Highways and roads are ubiquitous with high-speed racing cars. Only experienced and professional racers can perfectly avoid all the vehicles on the road.You have to be experienced enough to face all exciting challenges in this Highway Racing Car 3D games. Drive cars among complex heavy  vehicles on the roads be a racer in this driving game.
